data.name: ModuleHelp.Text
data.value:
About the XML/XSL Module

The XML/XSL Module renders the result of an XML/XSL transform. 

XML module is working in three steps;

  1. it queries XML Data,
  2. transforms the XML data using an XSL transformation,
  3. and returns the result back to the user.
  4. All settings are stored inside DotNetNuke.

Edit XML/XSL

  1. Xml Source
    Either an Xml File stored inside your portal or on an external webserver. The querystring for the external url can be built on runtime using DotNetNuke properties, User profile settings or Querystring/Form pass through values. You can setup credentials for the http request.
  2. XSL Script
    Either an XSL File stored inside your portal or on an external webserver.
    You can define XSL arguments based on DotNetNuke properties, User profile settings or Querystring/Form pass through values.
  3. Advanced Settings
    The result of the transformation is returned inside the DotNetNuke page by default. You can change this to support downloads.
    If the result of the transformation doesnot depend on dynamic parameters you can allow the module to be included in DotNetNuke search.

data.name: CAS.ErrorMessage
data.value: Accessing either the data source or the xsl stylesheets using http/https caused a security exeption. Your installation might run under medium trust and you try to access data outside your server. Please ask your administrator or hoster for more information.
